txt.en: Beside the Orc-camp at Ashúrz Maufulug, the Elf-scouts discovered a smaller kennel of Wargs and their goblin-keepers not far to the east of the stronghold of the Orcs.

'[placeholder], I am sure you learned that there is a kennel of Wargs, kept by several goblins, not far to the east of Ashúrz Maufulug. Maudhul-ulur is what the Enemy calls it.

'This camp is surely where the Wargs roaming the shores of the Mirk-eaves are coming from, and it is a threat we must deal with at once. I need you to enter Maudhul-ulur and defeat as many Wargs as you can.

'When you have completed your task, return to me.'
Wargs can be found at Maudhul-ulur, south from Echad Glamodúd.\n\nGoldínwen has asked you to defeat many Wargs at the kennel nearby.
'There were too many Wargs for you to destroy utterly? That is a pity, for we cannot hope to attack Ashúrz Maufulug while the beasts still wander.'
Goldínwen is at Echad Glamodúd, north from Maudhul-ulur.\n\nYou should return to Goldínwen with the news that you have defeated many Wargs at Maudhul-ulur.
'You have not slain the Wargs of Maudhul-ulur? That is fell news. Perhaps you should return there to complete your task.'
Talk to Goldínwen at Echad Glamodúd
Talk to Goldínwen at Echad Glamodúd
